content: introducing the happy hippy cardigan which is made with the granny stripe stitch the double_crochet stitch the treble_crochet stitch as well as the single_crochet stitch for the trim you are welcome to play around with colours as you make your sweater i would love to see lots of inspired colourways and palettes in this top this is an oversized cardigan with generous positive ease it is loosely crocheted on a large hook so it works up quickly ir ia an easy to follow pattern with clear instructions and pictures for help in the construction of the cardigan
